title: Internal/onboard low voltage supplies
fullText:
Internal/onboard supplies for a connectable electrical installation shall be provided by either —
(a) an RCD protected supply; or
(b) an isolated supply.
Sources shall comply with the relevant safety requirements of —
(i) AS/NZS 4763 for an inverter; and
(ii) AS/NZS 3010 for a generator.
The source shall provide short circuit protection in accordance with AS/NZS 3000. See Figures 2.8 and 2.9 for typical onboard supply wiring diagrams.
